title: Week 1: Course Introduction
description: Introduction to the course, objectives, and overview of data mining.

title: Week 2: Data Exploration (Visualization)
description: Techniques for exploring data through visualization and understanding datasets.

title: Week 3: Data Normalization and Feature Extraction
description: Continued exploration of dataset preparation, focusing on normalization and feature extraction methods.

title: Week 4: Supervised Learning: Logistic Regression
description: Introduction to supervised learning techniques, starting with logistic regression.

title: Week 5: Supervised Learning: Decision Trees
description: Building upon supervised learning techniques with a focus on decision trees.

title: Week 6: Supervised Learning: Random Forests
description: Exploring the random forests algorithm as an advanced supervised learning technique.

title: Week 7: Supervised Learning: Neural Networks
description: Introduction to neural networks as part of advanced supervised learning techniques.

title: Week 8: Supervised Learning: Ensemble Methods
description: Further exploration of advanced supervised learning techniques with ensemble methods.

title: Week 9: Fall Break
description: No classes during the fall break.

title: Week 10: Unsupervised Learning: Clustering
description: Introduction to unsupervised learning techniques focused on clustering algorithms.

title: Week 11: Unsupervised Learning: Dimensionality Reduction
description: Continued exploration of unsupervised learning with a focus on dimensionality reduction methods.

title: Week 12: Generative Models
description: Introduction to advanced unsupervised techniques, including generative models.

title: Week 13: Advanced Topic: Text Mining
description: Exploration of text mining techniques and their applications in natural language processing.

title: Week 14: Advanced Topic: Reinforcement Learning
description: Introduction to reinforcement learning as an advanced topic in data mining.

title: Week 15: Final Project Work
description: Students will begin their comprehensive data mining projects simulating real-world challenges.

title: Week 16: Final Project Presentations
description: Presentations of final projects to showcase data mining findings and results.
